amendment.description: Amendment reduces Federal Prison System Salaries and Expenses funding by $173,480.
amendment.purpose: Amendment no. 19 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce Federal Prison System Salaries and Expenses funding by $173,480, the average cost of incarcerating the non-citizens currently detained when the INS denied bond, asylum, or other relief based on secret evidence.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Campbell amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 239 - 173 (Roll no. 315).
